content.query:
AwarenessWatchlist
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') and isnotempty(Email)
| summarize Count = count() by WatchlistCount
| project tostring(toint(WatchlistCount)) , Count
content.title: Breakdown by Watchlist Count

content.query:
AwarenessWatchlist
| project  Email , Name , ["Watchlist Count"]= WatchlistCount , UserState
content.title: Watchlist Overview

content.query:
AwarenessPerformanceDetails
| project Email , ["Num of Correct"]= NumCorrect ,["Num of Incorrect"]= NumIncorrect , ["Num of Not Watched"]= NumNotWatched, Name , ["User Details"] = UserDetails , ["User State"]= UserState , Department
content.title: Performance Overview

content.query:
AwarenessPerformanceDetails
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') and isnotempty(Email)
| extend NumCorrect = tostring( toint(NumCorrect)) 
| summarize Count = count() by NumCorrect
content.title: Correct Number by Count

content.query:
AwarenessPerformanceDetails
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') and isnotempty(Email)
| extend NumIncorrect = tostring( toint(NumIncorrect)) 
| summarize Count = count() by (NumIncorrect)
content.title: Incorrect Number by Count

content.query:
AwarenessPerformanceDetails
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') and isnotempty(Email)
| extend NumNotWatched = tostring( toint(NumNotWatched)) 
| sort by NumNotWatched 
| take 10
| summarize Count = count() by (NumNotWatched)
content.title: Not Watched by Count

parameters.name: Template_Name
parameters.label: Template Name
parameters.query:
AwarenessUserData
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') 
    and isnotempty(Email)
| where isnotempty(TemplateName)
| distinct TemplateName
| sort by TemplateName asc

content.query:
AwarenessUserData
| project Name,  Email, ["Template Name"] = TemplateName,Status, ["Number of Campaigns Clicked"] = NumCampaignsClicked, ["Number of Campaigns Sent"] = NumCampaignsSent, ["Number of Correct Answers"] = NumCorrectAnswers, ["Number of Incorrect Answers"] = NumIncorrectAnswers, ["Number of Training Modules Assigned"] = NumTrainingModulesAssigned, ["User State"] = UserState, ["Clicked IP"] = ClickedIp, ["Reaction Time"] = ReactionTime, ["Time Clicked"] = TimeClicked, ["Time Opened"] = TimeOpened
content.title: User Stats Overview

content.query:
AwarenessUserData
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') 
    and isnotempty(Email)
    and  isnotempty(TemplateName)
|  where ( ('{Template_Name}') == "*" or TemplateName == ('{Template_Name}'))
//| summarize by Email, TemplateName, NumCampaignsSent
| summarize Count = count()  by NumCampaignsSent
| project tostring(toint(NumCampaignsSent)) , Count
content.title: Breakdown by Number of Campaigns Sent

content.query:
AwarenessSafeScore
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or EmailAddress == '{Email}') and isnotempty(EmailAddress)
| summarize Count = count() by Risk
| order by Risk desc
| take 1
content.title: Highest Risk

content.json: 💡 To view Risk details, please click on above tile

content.query:
AwarenessSafeScore
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or EmailAddress == '{Email}') and isnotempty(EmailAddress)
|project ["Email Address"] = EmailAddress , Name , Risk , ["Human Error"] = HumanError, Sentiment, Engagement , Knowledge , UserState
| order by Risk desc
//| take 1
content.title: Highest Risk Details

| where ('{Email}' == "*" or EmailAddress == '{Email}') and isnotempty(EmailAddress)

| project Risk, Count

parameters.name: Template_Name
parameters.label: Template Name
parameters.query:
AwarenessUserData
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') 
    and isnotempty(Email)
| where isnotempty(TemplateName)
| distinct TemplateName
| sort by TemplateName asc

content.query:
AwarenessUserData
| where ('{Email}' == "*" or Email == '{Email}') 
    and isnotempty(Email)
| summarize by Email, TemplateName
| summarize Count = count() by TemplateName
| order by Count desc
| take 10
| project TemplateName, Count
content.title: Breakdown of Top 10 Template Names

content.query:
AwarenessUserData
| where  Status == "CLICKED"
| summarize arg_max(ReactionTime, *) by Email, TemplateName
|extend ['Reaction Time'] = ReactionTime, ['Time Clicked'] = TimeClicked , ['Time Opened'] = TimeOpened , ['Template Name'] = TemplateName 
| project Email, ['Reaction Time'],  ['Time Clicked'] ,  ['Time Opened'], ['Template Name']
| order by ['Reaction Time'] asc
content.title: Users Clicked on Phishing data

content.query:
AwarenessUserData
| project Name,  Email, ["Template Name"] = TemplateName,Status, ["Number of Campaigns Clicked"] = NumCampaignsClicked, ["Number of Campaigns Sent"] = NumCampaignsSent, ["Number of Correct Answers"] = NumCorrectAnswers, ["Number of Incorrect Answers"] = NumIncorrectAnswers, ["Number of Training Modules Assigned"] = NumTrainingModulesAssigned, ["User State"] = UserState, ["Clicked IP"] = ClickedIp, ["Reaction Time"] = ReactionTime, ["Time Clicked"] = TimeClicked, ["Time Opened"] = TimeOpened
content.title: User Stats Overview
